Voila !!


I'm a MS in Data Science Student at Texas A&M univeristy with 2+ years of work experience in Data Science, NLP and Big-data Analytics.

I currently work as a Graduate Research Assistant with Prof. Jian Tao and Vice President of Research's office to develop an NLP based scholar recommender system.

After completing my Integrated B.Tech and M.Tech from IIT Madras I worked at American Express for 2 years, inititally as a Big-Data Analyst and then as Product Owner before joining TAMU.
